revision.text:
'''ZDoom Executor''' is a friendly and modern profile based frontend for ZDoom and its derivatives.
==Features== *Launch ZDoom and its source ports quickly and easily. *Never fiddle again for your IWADs: set their location once and they're always available. *Slick interface. *Manage your mods with a profile based system: just load your profile and you're ready to go. *You can set and launch with a single click up to five of your favourite profiles. *IWAD Identifier: got a WAD with a weird name, want to know what's in it or is it a duplicate? Just use the WAD Identifier. *Free software (both as in beer and as in freedom!) *Understandable and modular Lazarus/Free Pascal source! Create your own fork or enhance the launcher easily.
==External Link== *[http://zdexe.sourceforge.net/ ZDoom Executor Official Website]. [[Category:Tools]]
